DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the impact of induction of labour at 38 weeks with the induction of labour at 40 weeks in women with insulin dependent gestational diabetes mellitus on maternal and fetal outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Dependent Gestational Diabetes Mellitus: Randomized Trial of Induction of Labour at 38 and 40 Weeks of Gestation
DOC.criteria: pregnant women with insulin dependent gestational diabetes mellitus chronic inflammatory disease, autoimmune disease, preexisting diabetes mellitus, previous cesarean section, multiple pregnancies
